events.message: The policyholder reported a car collision that occurred on April 30th involving another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after preliminary review of the reported incident details.
Agent John Matthews was assigned to manage the case and serve as the point of contact for the policyholder.
An official acknowledgment of the accident claim was sent to the policyholder confirming receipt and next steps.
We have requested photographs of the damaged vehicle, police report, and the other party’s insurance information.
The policyholder submitted all the requested documents including photos, the police accident report, and the other driver’s details.
An investigation into the circumstances of the collision began to verify fault and assess damage extent.
Investigation completed successfully, determining that the other vehicle was at fault and damage assessments were finalized.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover repair costs and associated expenses based on the investigation findings.
The policyholder expressed satisfaction with the communication and promptness of the claim handling process.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Insurance payment was processed and issued to the policyholder’s specified bank account for vehicle repairs.
The claim was formally closed after the policyholder confirmed receipt of payment and satisfaction with the settlement.
